aboutMe.headline: About me
aboutMe.description1: I am a junior Frontend developer from Dortmund, passionate about technology and always eager to learn new skills. I am currently looking for a full-time position to grow in a creative environment and take on new challenges.
aboutMe.description2: If you are looking for a dedicated developer with a strong willingness to learn, I would be happy to hear from you!
aboutMe.officeStatus: Open to in-office, hybrid, and remote work.

mySkills.headline: My skills
mySkills.description1: Don’t see the skill you need?

portfolio.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

portfolioProject.description: Program that retrieves data about Pokémon from an API and presents it as a card deck. Includes a search function for easy navigation and finding Pokémon.
Jump-and-Run game: A game developed using object-oriented programming. Defeat enemies on the way to the final boss and collect items along the way.
Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

references.description: I thrive both independently and as part of a team. Here’s what my colleagues have to say about working with me.

reference.statement: Tobias is an inspiring classmate at DA. His motivating nature is contagious and pulls you along. He also has the ability to develop an interest in tackling problems beyond his immediate scope.

Tobias always completes his tasks reliably, communicates clearly and effectively within the team, and develops well-thought-out solutions. His motivating nature inspires others and creates a positive work atmosphere.h

I met Tobias during our training as Fullstack developers. His passion and open nature truly impressed me, leading to regular exchanges. For Tobias, there are no obstacles, only the question: How do we approach it to develop a solution? In short – a smart guy you enjoy having around.

footer.headline: Say Hi!
footer.formHeadline: Want to discuss a new project?
footer.formSlogan: Say hello! let's discuss your ideas and make it happen
footer.formPrivacyPolicy3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

legalNotice.generalInformationText: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data refers to all data that can be used to personally identify you. Detailed information on the topic of data protection can be found in our privacy policy listed below.
legalNotice.responsibleParty: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
legalNotice.responsiblePartyText: The data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the section 'Notice concerning the responsible party' in this privacy policy.
legalNotice.howWeCollectData: How do we collect your data?
legalNotice.howWeCollectDataText: Your data is collected in part by you providing it to us. This could be data that you enter into a contact form, for example.
legalNotice.automaticData: Other data is collected automatically or with your consent when you visit the website through our IT systems. This data includes primarily technical data (e.g., internet browser, operating system, or time of page access). This data is collected automatically as soon as you enter this website.
legalNotice.dataUsage: What do we use your data for?
legalNotice.dataUsageText: Part of the data is collected to ensure the error-free provision of the website. Other data may be used to analyze your user behavior.
legalNotice.dataRights: What rights do you have regarding your data?
legalNotice.dataRightsText: You have the right to request information about the origin, recipient, and purpose of your stored personal data at any time, free of charge. You also have the right to request the correction or deletion of this data. If you have given consent to data processing, you can revoke this consent at any time for the future. You also have the right, under certain circumstances, to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data. Additionally, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority.
legalNotice.contactForQuestions: For this and any other questions about data protection, you can contact us at any time.
legalNotice.hostingProvider: We host the content of our website with the following provider:
legalNotice.allInklText: The provider is ALL-INKL.COM - Neue Medien Münnich, Inh. René Münnich, Hauptstraße 68, 02742 Friedersdorf (hereinafter referred to as All-Inkl). You can find details in the privacy policy of All-Inkl: https://all-inkl.com/datenschutzinformationen/.
legalNotice.useOfAllInkl: The use of All-Inkl is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR. We have a legitimate interest in the most reliable presentation of our website possible. If consent has been requested, processing is carried out exclusively on the basis of Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR and § 25 para. 1 TTDPA, insofar as the consent includes the storage of cookies or access to information on the user's device (e.g., device fingerprinting) in accordance with the TTDPA. Consent can be revoked at any time.
